Pre-Game Insights: Ecuador will face Argentina in the Copa América 2024 quarterfinals on July 4, 2024, at 20:00 in the NRG Stadium, Houston.
Ecuador aims to advance to the top 4 of the tournament after a campaign with mixed results.
Ecuador seeks to defeat the reigning champion Argentina in a challenging match for the Tri.
Team Preparations: Félix Sánchez Bas, the Ecuadorian coach, may make changes to the team's system and could include a player in midfield.
Enner Valencia will be the only striker available for Ecuador, as Kevin Rodríguez, who played alongside him against Mexico, is not expected to feature.
Player Status: Kevin Rodríguez and Ángelo Preciado, who showed signs of fatigue against Mexico, have recovered and are in good condition to play.
Others: The winner of this match will advance to the semifinals and face the victor of the Venezuela vs. Canada game on July 5 in Arlington.
